name: innovatively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that uses new methods or ideas: To be successful at this game, you need to think innovatively. We must act swiftly and innovatively to find a way out of this crisis.
More examplesFewer examplesThe problem with this organization is that it does not encourage its employees to think innovatively.The successful candidate will be able to work flexibly and respond innovatively to new challenges.We need to present our products innovatively to make them more attractive to young people.
